ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New patch message
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, there s more out there in the discussion forum world than those two mailing lists. I ve read thru Necromonitor plenty of times (nice heavy traffic
ygData.messageBody:
Well, there's more out there in the discussion forum world than those two
mailing lists. I've read thru Necromonitor plenty of times (nice heavy
traffic there), among other sites and tho I think they are whiny, I also
believe they have plenty to whine about (thx nerf #45696083590 VERANT!).
Seriously, they should start cataloguing necro nerfs. I'm glad I didn't
start one as I would have probably deleted him by now out of frustration
with Verant's "enhancements". Bards have issues, but not as many because we
don't have quite the number of spells at our disposal that could possibly be
broken, nor do we have a built-in tank to bitch about. The difference is
when one of our songs is busted our bitching is rightfully magnified by
virtue that we have only 1 or 2 songs per level compared to every other
magic-capable class in the game. Anyways, my post was in response to a
rediculous waste of bandwidth on a stupid subject. Innocent bystanders may
be harmed in the process.

Sartori D'Elsiraad<Legion>
53rd Karaoke rapper, Veeshan


>From: "Cyr, Thierry" <thierry.cyr@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@egroups.com
>To: "'eqbards@egroups.com'" <eqbards@egroups.com>
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] New patch message
>Date: Fri, 26 May 2000 09:47:07 -0500
>
>umm i resent that remark. Im subscribed to both the bard and necro mailing
>list, and well, to make it plain and obvious for you, the bard msg board is
>way more of a whiny tune then the necro one. And I've been a bard way
>longer
>then a necro so dont think im saying this because im a necro. I just find
>there's more whining on this board, you wouldnt beleive how many threads
>i've deleted sometimes
>
>-Rakka 51 necro
>-Minkin 36 bard
>Sol Ro
